name: Destructive Termites
description:
Lead a termites invasion in a full of wooden food human house! Start by eating the soft objects and collect some exclusive boosters to increase your power! Boosters as iron-denture will allow you to eat even more human objects and drive them mad. But be careful not to lose all your troops or you'll lose the game! They will do everything in their power to destroy you, save some defensive boosters for the occasion.

Have you seen this tasty furniture? Your only way to victory is to eat it all!

----------

Video game developed for the Videogame Design and Programming course

of the Politecnico di Milano

Dipartimento di Elettronica, Informazione e Bioingegneria

Politecnico di Milano

https://www.facebook.com/polimigamecollective
